programme.desc: What's happening across Canada and around the world.

programme.title: The National
programme.desc: CBC's flagship nightly news program, featuring the day's top stories with in-depth and original journalism; Adrienne Arsenault and Ian Hanomansing anchor.

programme.title: CBC News: Morning
programme.desc: What do you need to know about the world around you? Heather Hiscox takes the helm as the anchor for this weekday-morning news program to tell you. Joining her is Colleen Jones with weather and sports info., and Danielle Bochove with all you need to know about the business world.

programme.title: About That
programme.desc: Andrew Chang expands the understanding of the stories everybody's talking about.
